name: Alzheimer2
description:
ALZHEIMER 2

What would you do to recover your memories? Alzh just forgot a lot of his life and he wants to remember some things before the night falls upon him. 

Help him recover part of his past by collecting his memories. You will have to take a journey across his spacial-head. If you are skilled enough, you will be able to come back alive. Beware of those shinny spinning-thoughts! They like to play bouncing you :)

Good luck!

[This game is part of a learning process]

CONTROLS

Keyboard arrows: move.

Spacebar: grab a memory.

SREENSHOTS
